title: 12/12: Tough Matchups, LAC-KC, Rookie QB Dynasty Outlooks (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
We start with a fun Philip Rivers stat and a review of our Waiver Wiring (3:00) before discussing some great players with tough matchups (10:40). Should Fantasy owners feel confident in Matt Ryan, Aaron Rodgers, Aaron Jones, Nick Chubb and Kenny Golladay? ... Some listener emails (21:20) and a LAC-KC preview (26:00). What are we doing with the RBs in this game? ... Will Brinson joins us (37:08) to pick apart Jamey and Heath's rankings of David Johnson and Jordy Nelson, discuss the Dynasty outlooks for this year's rookie QBs, brag about his undefeated team and more. Then we answer your tweets (54:30) and bring the Fantasy Regulators back (59:25) ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
